title: How Can Lord Krishna or Rama Become Visible to Us? | HH Stoka Krishna Swami
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: Now when Krishna Rama appears as the son of his devotees apparently taking birth like a ordinary
human being it's not at all ordinary it is not at all material he doesn't accept a material form
he comes in his original transcendental form means the form in the spiritual world which is
eternal and completely spiritual but we cannot see him in that form but then they become visible
as Krishna as Rama as Narasimha as Varaha by giving us the power to see them because our eyes
can only perceive material forms and that to all not all material forms like if the devatas were
to come and do come to this earth planet sometimes we cannot see them with these eyes because these
These eyes can only perceive gross form devatas have subtle material form sukshma sharira just like
we cannot see the form of a ghost because ghost has got only a subtle form.
